response.overview: Yuri Orlov is a globetrotting arms dealer and, through some of the deadliest war zones, he struggles to stay one step ahead of a relentless Interpol agent, his business rivals and even some of his customers who include many of the world's most notorious dictators. Finally, he must also face his own conscience.
response.tagline: Where there's a will, there's a weapon
response.title: Lord of War

results.name: Lord of War (2005) Official Trailer #1 - Nicolas Cage Movie
